headline: Ameriprise Adds 90 Advisors in Q3; UBS Reports Another Headcount Dip
summary: Ameriprise and UBS both reported positive revenue and earnings as strong markets and client transaction activity buoyed results, but UBS continues to face advisor attrition after changing its compensation plan and buyout packages.

headline: Ameriprise Financial (NYSE:AMP) Beats Expectations in Strong Q3
summary: Financial services company Ameriprise Financial (NYSE:AMP) reported Q3 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 12.6% year on year to $4.89 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $9.92 per share was 1.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Ameriprise: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — Ameriprise Financial Services Inc. AMP) on Thursday reported third-quarter earnings of $912 million. The Minneapolis-based company said it had profit of $9.33 per share.
